characters.name: Jinsu

blocks.5_CHARACTER: Jinsu, Korean male late 20s new employee
blocks.8_CAMERA: Medium Shot, front view, eye level, symmetrical composition
blocks.14_FACIAL_FEATURES: large glasses, expressive eyes, looks younger than his age
blocks.17_CLOTHING: ill-fitting navy blue suit, slightly-too-long sleeves, white shirt, crooked tie
blocks.22_LIGHTING: flat, even lighting, reminiscent of office fluorescents

characters.character_detail: timid anxious clumsy, average height 178cm skinny, black neat hair, oval face, large glasses, pale skin, ill-fitting navy suit, black-rimmed glasses
characters.voice_style: 20s male Korean Seoul nervous stuttering speaking style mid-high pitch

characters.name: CEO

blocks.6_MOOD_PERSONALITY: stern expressionless intimidating but surprisingly warm-hearted
blocks.8_CAMERA: Medium Shot, front view, eye level, symmetrical composition
blocks.14_FACIAL_FEATURES: wrinkles around the eyes, stern mouth, sharp eyes
blocks.17_CLOTHING: perfectly fitted dark gray suit, crisp white shirt, classic tie
blocks.20_POSE: standing straight, hands clasped behind back
blocks.22_LIGHTING: dramatic, slightly top-down lighting to create an imposing aura

characters.character_detail: stern intimidating warm-hearted, average height 175cm imposing, salt-and-pepper hair, square face, sharp eyes, perfectly fitted dark gray suit, luxury watch
characters.voice_style: 50s male Korean Seoul deep resonant authoritative speaking style low pitch

blocks.5_LOCATION: Office, a meticulously organized modern office
blocks.7_CAMERA: Wide Shot, front view, eye level, symmetrical composition
blocks.10_COLOR_TONE: muted pastels, beige, light gray, with a single accent color
blocks.14_OBJECT: perfectly aligned desks, computers, identical office chairs, a single large potted plant
blocks.16_NATURAL_LIGHT: soft, diffused light from large, clean windows
blocks.21_BACKGROUND: the CEO's glass-walled office at the far end
blocks.22_LEFT_SIDE: a row of filing cabinets, perfectly aligned
blocks.23_RIGHT_SIDE: a matching row of filing cabinets
blocks.24_CEILING/SKY: white ceiling tiles, symmetrically placed lights
